mapper.select: select memberEmail, memberName, memberPassword, memberGender, memberPhoneNum, memberJoinGrade, memberCapGrade from member where memberNum = #{memberNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET memberEmail =#{memberEmail}, memberName= #{memberName}, memberPassword = #{memberPassword}, memberGender = #{memberGender}, memberPhoneNum = #{memberPhoneNum}, memberJoinGrade = #{memberJoinGrade}, memberCapGrade = #{memberCapGrade} WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum}
mapper.select: select deliciousMapNum, deliciousMapName, deliciousMapTag, deliciousMapDetail, deliciousMapOpen, date_format(str_to_date(deliciousMapCreateDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '%Y-%m-%d') deliciousMapCreateDate, memberNum from deliciousMap where memberNum = #{memberNum}

SELECT deliciousMapNum,deliciousMapNum, memberNum, deliciousMapTitle, deliciousMapContent, deliciousMapWriteDate, deliciousMapImg, deliciousMapGrade FROM deliciousMapReview where deliciousMapNum = #{deliciousMapNum}
